#Objects

pa point
pb point
pc point
pd point
pe point

lab line
lce line

ca circle
cb circle

#Relations

start_point(pa, lab)
end_point(pb, lab)

centre(pa, ca)
centre(pb, cb)

coincident(pc, ca)
coincident(pc, cb)
coincident(pe, ca)
coincident(pe, cb)
not equal(pc, pe)

start_point(pc, lce)
end_point(pe, lce)

coincident(pd, lab)
coincident(pb, lce)
